å·²å°†ä¸åŒå¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹çš„æ¥å£è¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆ model.invoke ï¼‰ï¼Œå°è£…æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å†…æ ¸çš„ Hook ï¼ˆsrc/hooks/useInvokeAsync.tsï¼‰ï¼Œå¯åœ¨ç»„ä»¶å’Œhooksä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

ä¾‹å­ï¼š

<script setup lang="ts">
import { inject, ref } from "vue";
import { useInvokeAsync } from "@hooks/index";
import StateManager from "@utils/store";
const invokeAsync = useInvokeAsync();
const store = inject<StateManager>("store");
/* Promise è¯·æ±‚ç¤ºä¾‹ */
type NumType = {
  data: {
    num: number;
  };
};
const isLoading = ref<boolean>(false);
const params = ref<number>(1);
const add = async () => {
  isLoading.value = true;
  const data = await invokeAsync<NumType>("getNumType", params.value);
  params.value = data.data.num;
  isLoading.value = false;
};
</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <button @click="add" :disabled="isLoading">è¯·æ±‚</button>
    <div>{{ isLoading ? "åŠ è½½ä¸­" : "å®ŒæˆåŠ è½½" }}</div>
  </div>
</template>

<style scoped lang="less">
</style>
